abstract: After Sprint hinted that it was thinking about introducing a cellphone plan with unlimited minutes, Verizon beat it to the punch. To keep up, Sprint, which is losing market share, will probably have to cut prices deeper than it had planned.
snippet: After Sprint hinted that it was thinking about introducing a cellphone plan with unlimited minutes, Verizon beat it to the punch. To keep up, Sprint, which is losing market share, will probably have to cut prices deeper than it had planned.
lead_paragraph: Why would Verizon take the lead in introducing wireless price plans with unlimited usage when it is a leader in the field and gaining market share?

headline.main: Verizon Stabs Sprint With Unlimited Wireless Plan
